sourcesContent:
Subtasks
1/4
  • Subtask name
  • {{subtask.title}}
  • Add subtask
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-subtask-list', templateUrl: './subtask-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./subtask-list.component.scss'] }) export class SubtaskListComponent { subTasks = [ { checked: true, title: 'Send invoice to collections agency' }, { checked: false, title: 'Write an email to them to follow-up' }, { checked: false, title: 'Send paper mail to account' }, { checked: true, title: `This is my new subtask... I'm autofocused here when I add a subtask` } ] changeCheckStatus(index: number) { } }
